website_summaries.verdict: Among Adidas’ collections, the NMD line is arguably the most popular. The NMD_XR1, however, can be considered as the most underrated in this series despite its superior comfort and fashion-forward aesthetics.Like most sneakers, this have minor flaws that did not stop consumers from buying it. Addicted to the comfort that the Boost technology and Primeknit upper provide as well as its minimalistic and straightforward design, fans of Adidas are just left hungry for more.
pros: Many are impressed with its unique and minimalistic look
This sneaker was easy to put on and take off, a good number of buyers have said
Nearly all have confirmed that the Adidas NMD_XR1 Primeknit feels extremely comfortable with or without insoles
The NMD XR1 Primeknit can be worn all day without problems, a significant number have informed
“Beautiful,” “nice” and “clean” are words commonly used by fans to describe the shoe’s silhouette
The sole provides a reliable grip, and the Primeknit upper was light, stretchy and breathable, based on a few reviews
This version of NMD_XR1 with Primeknit can be worn on various occasions, dressed up or dressed down, the majority of reviewers revealed
When worn for work as well as traveling and walking, the shoe performs satisfactorily, a couple of users disclosed
Those who how tried using orthotics with the Adidas NMD_XR1 PK remained pleased with the shoe’s fit
A few like that the laces on this shoe match well with its design
cons: A small number thinks that this model fits a bit narrow
Some are not pleased with the quality of the NMD XR1 Primeknit
The midsole blocks can be felt and also caused blisters, some have observed
Few say that this model’s heel could use more cushioning

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: F A K E shoes! I hope Amazon can control this case.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7 shoe and bought the 6.5. I think I should have bought the 6 because the fabric will stretch but still wearable. The black is sharp looking and love the soft pink accent. Amazon has these for $10 less than other stores and with Prime its a done deal! I would highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit big. Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are definitely shady. Have some different languages on it etc. They seem very comfortable EXCEPT that they are about a size and a half too big! I am a true size 6. This says 6 but also says FR 37.5 which is typically 7.5 US. That’s how they fit. Way big. Took a while for shipping. About 3 days over what they said.
customer_reviews.author: SK, Houston

customer_reviews.title: Chicago city sports is terrible to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I had to pay 20$ to return them because they didn’t fit. Don’t buy from Chicago city sports unless you know you’re not going to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are THE most comfortable shoes I have ever purchased. I wear a size 13 with an E width and these fit nicely right out of the box. It did take a bit of work to get my foot inside, but after about a dozen times, my feet slid in nicely. I will definitely be making another purchase of these shoes another time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds....
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. Went walking for miles and my feet couldn’t have been happier. I’m actually thinking of buying a second pair in another color. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parcasio

customer_reviews.title: Good stylish buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 15 year old grandson. Followed online advice for how to measure fot for shoe size. Adidas size is true to size. Insoles have extra comfort & support. Lightweight shoe but seems sturdy. The black with red style is evidently popular among young men. Only downer, the high price. But Amazon had the best price & free shipping during the holidays. Would recommend this product. best
customer_reviews.author: Zippy1948

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, Adidas Boost is not a Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe how much comfort the Adidas Boost Technology adds to their shoes. I will be buying more, the bounching feeling is amazing and I am able to walk on my feet for 8-10hrs straight with 0 issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bagelz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe so far. He wears them all the time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these for her boyfriend and he loves then. Wears them all the time and they fit him perfectly. So far they are holding up to being worn all the time
customer_reviews.author: Teri A

customer_reviews.title: Very on trend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old daughter and she LOVES them! They do run wide but that works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not Original ADIDAS, knock offs
customer_reviews.text: These are knockoff sneakers called boost which is the name on the inside of the shoes that came to me. The seller doesn’t make it known that these are not original ADIDAS shoes. I returned them before ever trying them on because I was expecting ADIDAS not boost. Please beware.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! My true shoe size is a 7 1/2. Reviews everywhere say this runs a 1/2 size bigger so I ordered a 7, which I could have gone between 6.5 to 7 for this style. Either size would have been great either way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Smrt7

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these. Horrible order through adidas and save yourself the disappointment

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, super comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, super comfortable and stylish. Bought these as walking shoes for two days at Disneyland Parks, Adidas has really stepped up their game in comfort. These rival Nike Air Max shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Strader

customer_reviews.title: Dirty laces
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came as expected but the laces on the left shoe were dirtied.

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought these for her boyfriend. he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Jieselle Mc Collin

customer_reviews.title: Received as indicated and as promised. Very quality material ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as indicated and as promised. Very quality material. Although, very little arch support. But, my orthodics fit and provided the need support.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Gaberdiel

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I loved them true to size, thank you fast shipping as will definitely will be getting more stuff in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Santana

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT REAL ADIDAS
customer_reviews.text: I did some research after putting these on. Authentic Adidas have a label stitched into the tongue of each shoe, and each should have a different serial number. There is NO LABEL on these, and the loop to pull them on on the back of the show is in a different language. FAKE SHOES> UNCOMFORTABLE. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moseman

customer_reviews.title: Received worn dirty shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I received are worn, have creases, the packaging was not good. The soles are dirty. Very disappointed. Please watch the video to see.

customer_reviews.title: Great for active people.
customer_reviews.text: very high end shoes. My 11 year old loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It threw me off that the sole wasn’t super soft, but it honestly doesn’t affect the wear. It is very comfortable and light!

customer_reviews.title: glue stains all on the boost blocks and the prime ...
customer_reviews.text: glue stains all on the boost blocks and the prime net that connects to the shoes were stained on my one of them. I suspect that they are fake as well buy from stockx or goat don't get scammed. Is there anyway i can get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent, very comfortable! Will buy them again in another color
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe in a size 9..glad I did as they fit like a glove. they arrived in the original box. I looked both shoes over completely finding no flaws, at all.btw, the square black logo patch on the tongue is not plastic its leather. I am very satisfied with my purchase and I'm going to order another pair from this store.
customer_reviews.author: robert rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very comfortable. For those saying they are fake because there is no logo on the blue of the sole, the XR1 have no logo there, that is on the R1 version. These are legit. Very fast shipping as well. Awesome transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moyer

customer_reviews.title: For the record white doesn't stay white
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable not alot of grip but that is ok you can bleach them to get a little white back but once the get stained it looks bad, I live in the country so my shoes are brown overal great shoe and way better than Nike
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jo Banks

customer_reviews.title: Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is adorable but way too wide on my foot (not a narrow foot). I was able to slide in and out of the shoe with them tied up tight. Disappointed and had to return.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Adidas tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as picture and size fit is accurate. I would recommend this shoe & would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve worn, however it is definitely recommended that you go one size down, normally I’m a 13 in dress shoes and Nike’s, which was my shoe of choice before, but these Adidas have been nothing short of perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs a bit small but is very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes feel like you're walking on a cloud and they look really ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came really quick, I was a little worried because they did not come directly from Adidas but they are as authentic as can be. These shoes feel like you're walking on a cloud and they look really good. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s original one or not can you improve that please

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing that i dislike about, i love the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Henry Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with the new shoes thansk
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Fit snug and comfortable. I run 23 miles a day mainly because ...
customer_reviews.text: Light as a feather. Fit snug and comfortable. I run 23 miles a day mainly because I don't want to be at home... but that's a different story. The shoes let your feet breath.i would definitely buy a secondary pair.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable too. The delivery time couldn't be any better
customer_reviews.text: Dope shoes, and we'll worth the money. Very comfortable too. The delivery time couldn't be any better.

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feel alright. but.........
customer_reviews.text: Seems alright. although i have another pair of XR1 NMDs bought in Munich which was way more comfortable. This also has some glue issues at the tip which i didnt have with the other NMD bought from a store.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes do not look like the one in the picture

customer_reviews.title: Anyone will appreciate the beauty of NMD's

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe! Super comfortable, I have plantar fasciitis and I don't even need to wear orthotics in these shoes. Only thing is they are a bit large around my ankles since they don't adjust. Not a big deal. Love them.

product_meta.title: adidas Mens - NMD_XR1 - Triple White - BY3052
product_meta.description: These adidas NMD_XR1 PK runners come in their OG colourway and draw their inspirations from the adidas archives. Soft and lightweight Primeknit uppers are adorned with a deep black colourway, as are the synthetic TPU cages which cover the sidewalls and come complete with a ventilated mesh window. An debossed logo tab sits at the tongue and the heels are adorned with a refined leather overlay.
